numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that there are more players of color in sports than managers and head coaches.
2. I think that there should be more leaders of color than there are now.
3. I wonder why there are fewer leaders of color than players of color in sports.
6. This situation shows that any person can play sports regardless of race or gender.
7. I think that, over time, more people of color can become managers and head coaches.
8. This graph displays the ratio of players of color to head coaches in different leagues.
9. I think that the title of this graph should be "The absence of diverse leaders in sports".
